name: Extreme Prejudice
description: Your hatred of a particular type of creature has honed your killer instinct.
prerequisites: Seething Hatred, sneak attack +3d6, studied target class feature.
benefit: When you succeed at a sneak attack against a creature you selected as the target of your Seething Hatred feat, you use d8s to roll sneak attack damage instead of d6s.
staminaText: When you succeed at a sneak attack against a creature that is not the target of your Seething Hatred<sup>ACG</sup> feat, you can spend 5 stamina points to treat the creature as if it were the target of your Seething Hatred for that attack.
